initial_conditions module¶

initial_conditions.bcc(density, n_particles)¶

Calculates the positions of particles when they are in a face-centered cubic crystaline shape.

Parameters:
  • density (double) – density of particles
  • n_particles (int) – total number of particles
Returns:

position (numpy.array (dim=3*n_particles) )
initial_conditions.fcc(density, n_particles)¶

Calculates the positions of particles when they are in a face-centered cubic crystaline shape.

Parameters:
  • density (double) – density of particles
  • n_particles (int) – total number of particles
Returns:

position (numpy.array (dim=3*n_particles) )
initial_conditions.simplecubic(density, n_particles)¶

Calculates the positions of particles when they are in a simple cubic crystaline shape.

Parameters:
  • density (double) – density of particles
  • n_particles (int) – total number of particles
Returns:

position (numpy.array (dim=3*n_particles) )
